event.original:
<Event xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events/event">
    <System>
      <Provider Name="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon" Guid="{5770385f-c22a-43e0-bf4c-06f5698ffbd9}" />
      <EventID>1</EventID>
      <Version>5</Version>
      <Level>4</Level>
      <Task>1</Task>
      <Opcode>0</Opcode>
      <Keywords>0x8000000000000000</Keywords>
      <TimeCreated SystemTime="2023-09-20T22:08:30.2988419Z" />
      <EventRecordID>12809</EventRecordID>
      <Correlation />
      <Execution ProcessID="4360" ThreadID="5336" />
      <Channel>Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational</Channel>
      <Computer>DESKTOP-22QKO5D</Computer>
      <Security UserID="S-1-5-18" />
    </System>
    <EventData>
      <Data Name="RuleName">-</Data>
      <Data Name="UtcTime">2023-09-20 22:08:30.284</Data>
      <Data Name="ProcessGuid">{23b237de-6d5e-650b-0506-000000002000}</Data>
      <Data Name="ProcessId">9348</Data>
      <Data Name="Image">C:\Program Files\WindowsApps\PythonSoftwareFoundation.Python.3.7_3.7.2544.0_x64__qbz5n2kfra8p0\python.exe</Data>
      <Data Name="FileVersion">3.7.9</Data>
      <Data Name="Description">Python</Data>
      <Data Name="Product">Python</Data>
      <Data Name="Company">Python Software Foundation</Data>
      <Data Name="OriginalFileName">python.exe</Data>
      <Data Name="CommandLine">"C:\Users\Positivo BGH\AppData\Local\Microsoft\WindowsApps\python.exe" -c "import sys; print('hello')"</Data>
      <Data Name="CurrentDirectory">C:\Users\Positivo BGH\Desktop\nahuel\</Data>
      <Data Name="User">DESKTOP-22QKO5D\Positivo BGH</Data>
      <Data Name="LogonGuid">{23b237de-625a-650b-3418-9b0000000000}</Data>
      <Data Name="LogonId">0x9b1834</Data>
      <Data Name="TerminalSessionId">2</Data>
      <Data Name="IntegrityLevel">High</Data>
      <Data Name="Hashes">SHA1=104605DE5514465D8334F0A27AB4F773ABF5BF3E,MD5=3EC94A0EB1016971F8B073FDB6ECA966,SHA256=90AC242852C321F469B908F83A345B387A41A71722122A63646BF8EE74097D88,IMPHASH=2897A2A24664AE65557EDC80442FBEDE</Data>
      <Data Name="ParentProcessGuid">{23b237de-6cd1-650b-0006-000000002000}</Data>
      <Data Name="ParentProcessId">7008</Data>
      <Data Name="ParentImage">C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe</Data>
      <Data Name="ParentCommandLine">"C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe"</Data>
      <Data Name="ParentUser">DESKTOP-22QKO5D\Positivo BGH</Data>
    </EventData>
  </Event>

rule.description: Identifies when a Python script is executed using command line input and imports the sys module. Attackers often use this method to execute malicious scripts and avoiding writing it to disk.
rule.name: Python Script Execution via Command Line
